player.name: Bard
player.background: Bard is a Cinderspawn mage whose very presence seems to shimmer with latent heat, fine ash trailing him like a whispered secret. His skin, a mosaic of charcoal and ember-glow, crackles softly as inner flames periodically surge beneath the surface—a visible testament to his race's regenerative nature. With INT 15 and WIS 15, his piercing amber eyes betray an insatiable curiosity, though his quiet demeanor (CHA 8) suggests a mind more inclined to contemplation than charisma. The Ashen Covenant's teachings resonate deeply with his introspective nature, his WIL 13 reflecting a resolve tempered by the philosophy of impermanence. Though his physical frame is unremarkable (STR 8, CON 10), Bard moves with deliberate precision, as if conserving energy for the mental rigor of spellcraft. His ash-walking abilities remain nascent, but the Covenant elders note an unusual affinity for communing with ember-spirits. Beneath his tattered scholar's robes, faint scars glow intermittently where controlled burns have etched lessons into his flesh—a mage's journey written in both flame and flesh.

world.game_date: Ancient Age, Year 2442, Awakening, Springtide, Verdance 1 (Firstday)
world.calendar_string: Ancient Age, Year 2442, Awakening, Springtide, Verdance 1 (Firstday)

conversation_history.content:
==== WELCOME TO YOUR ADVENTURE ====

Greetings, Bard the Cinderspawn Mage from Bard is a Cinderspawn mage whose very presence seems to shimmer with latent heat, fine ash trailing him like a whispered secret. His skin, a mosaic of charcoal and ember-glow, crackles softly as inner flames periodically surge beneath the surface—a visible testament to his race's regenerative nature. With INT 15 and WIS 15, his piercing amber eyes betray an insatiable curiosity, though his quiet demeanor (CHA 8) suggests a mind more inclined to contemplation than charisma. The Ashen Covenant's teachings resonate deeply with his introspective nature, his WIL 13 reflecting a resolve tempered by the philosophy of impermanence. Though his physical frame is unremarkable (STR 8, CON 10), Bard moves with deliberate precision, as if conserving energy for the mental rigor of spellcraft. His ash-walking abilities remain nascent, but the Covenant elders note an unusual affinity for communing with ember-spirits. Beneath his tattered scholar's robes, faint scars glow intermittently where controlled burns have etched lessons into his flesh—a mage's journey written in both flame and flesh.!

Your journey begins now...
Welcome back, Bard! You are currently at Ashen Camp.

The morning mist clings to the valley of Ashen Camp like a spectral veil, its tendrils curling around the charred stone pillars that mark the Covenant's sanctuary. You stand at the edge of the central plaza, your boots crunching softly on the layer of fine ash that blankets the ground. The air carries the scent of smoldering cedar and the distant murmur of chanting—Elder Vareth's voice rising in the Ritual of Embers, its cadence syncing with the faint crackle of heat beneath your skin. Your tattered robes, singed at the hem from yesterday's failed pyroclastic experiment, flutter as a warm breeze stirs the mist. To the east, the silhouette of the Obsidian Spire looms, its tip glowing faintly as if sharing a secret with the waking sun. A half-written scroll lies abandoned at your feet, its diagrams of ember-spirit sigils smudged by an accidental spark. The camp's communal firepit smolders nearby, its coals pulsing in rhythm with the slow beat of your own regenerated flesh—a reminder of both your power and your limitations. Somewhere in the mist, a bird's cry echoes, sharp and sudden, snapping you back to the present.
Welcome back, Bard! You are currently at Ashen Camp.

As the first light of dawn filters through the wisps of ash-laden mist, you find yourself at the heart of Ashen Camp, specifically near the quiet fireplace area. The air is clear and cool, pierced occasionally by the distant calls of birds greeting the new day. Smoldering embers rest in the firepit nearby, their faint glow still pulsing softly—testament to the lingering warmth of yesterday's rituals. Your tattered robes bear the marks of your studies, and faint scars beneath your ash-ghostly skin hint at lessons learned in fire and flesh. The ceremonial area hums with a quiet energy; elders' voices and the crackle of embers form a subtle symphony of renewal. Moments ago, you might have been contemplating your next move or perhaps tending to the camp's ritual fires, your mind still partly attuned to the ember-spirits you've been communing with. The surroundings serve as a reminder of your ongoing journey—the path of a mage forged in ash, seeking mastery over flame and self.

551cdb35-a4bb-4b23-b6c1-4d2772947efb.title: Whispers of the Ash Plane (Ashen Covenant Recruit)
551cdb35-a4bb-4b23-b6c1-4d2772947efb.description: The Ashen Elder has tasked you with your first practical Ash Walking ritual. The Covenant needs to find a new, safe migration path, and the Elder believes a long-dead ancestor holds the key within the Ash Plane. You must project your consciousness, seek the ancestral spirit, and glean crucial information to guide your people.

objectives.description: Gather specific ritual ashes from the designated area near the Ashen Camp.
objectives.completion_criteria: Collect the required ritual ashes for the Ash Walking ceremony.

objectives.description: Perform the guided Ash Walking ritual at the sacred altar within the Ashen Camp.
objectives.completion_criteria: Successfully initiate the Ash Walking ritual and project your consciousness.

objectives.description: Within the Ash Plane, seek out the ancestral spirit and glean information about a safe migration path.
objectives.completion_criteria: Obtain the cryptic message or vision from the ancestral spirit.

objectives.description: Return to your body and consult with the Ashen Elder to interpret the ancestral message.
objectives.completion_criteria: Discuss the ancestral message with the Ashen Elder to understand its meaning.

objectives.description: Based on the interpreted ancestral guidance, scout the new migration path in Echo Woods.
objectives.completion_criteria: Locate and assess the viability of the new migration path as indicated by the ancestor.
Have at least 1 test_apple in inventory.

TEST_Q04.title: Q04 – Speak to the Test Elder

objectives.completion_criteria: Objective completed after 600 seconds have elapsed.
Gate opened with test_key and guardian defeated.
Arrive at either test_dock or test_harbor.
Objective completed with no alarm raised.

TEST_Q13.title: Q13 – Semantic Mandatory + Optional DSL
TEST_Q13.description: Mandatory semantic objective and optional visit objective.

TEST_Q14.title: Q14 – Flag Chain
TEST_Q14.description: Require both flags set (speak to guard and acquire pass).

objectives.description: Speak to guard and acquire pass.
objectives.completion_criteria: Guard spoken to and pass acquired.

TEST_Q16.title: Q16 – Any of Three Enemies
TEST_Q16.description: Defeat any one of three test bandits.

objectives.completion_criteria: Defeat at least one of test_bandit_1/2/3.

TEST_Q19.title: Q19 – Mixed All/Any
TEST_Q19.description: Travel to dock or harbor and have a test_ticket.

objectives.description: Visit test_dock or test_harbor and show test_ticket.
objectives.completion_criteria: Entry permitted with test_ticket at dock or harbor.

TEST_Q20.title: Q20 – Optional Does Not Block
TEST_Q20.description: Optional objective should not block completion.

TEST_Q21.title: Q21 – Narrative-Heavy Objective
TEST_Q21.description: Deliver an inspiring speech to the council.

objectives.description: Deliver an inspiring speech to the test_council about unity and cooperation.

TEST_Q23.title: Q23 – Semantic Failure Gating
TEST_Q23.description: Objective completion depends on semantic inference only.

TEST_Q24.title: Q24 – Abandon/Fallback Scenario
TEST_Q24.description: Regular quest for abandon/failure flow testing.

TEST_Q25.title: Q25 – Complex Mixed Conditions
TEST_Q25.description: Any of two routes, but no alarm and with resource gate.

objectives.description: Route A (visit test_tower AND have test_rope) OR Route B (defeat test_spider_queen) with no alarm.
objectives.completion_criteria: No alarm triggered; either tower+rope route or spider queen defeated.

notes.title: The Resonance Calendar
notes.summary: An overview of the canonical cycles: eras, cycles (years), phases, tides, spans (months), and days.
notes.content: The Resonance Calendar divides time into Eras, Cycles (years), Phases, Tides, Spans (months), and Days. Each day is tracked precisely and grouped into spans, tides, and phases to reflect the world's metaphysical rhythms. This entry summarizes the structure used by scholars and navigators across Aetheris.

STR.name: STRENGTH
STR.description: Physical power, affects melee damage and carrying capacity.

DEX.name: DEXTERITY
DEX.description: Agility and reflexes, affects ranged attacks, initiative, and dodge.

CON.name: CONSTITUTION
CON.description: Physical resilience, affects health, stamina, and resistance to poison/disease.

INT.name: INTELLIGENCE
INT.description: Mental acuity, affects spell power and learning ability.

WIS.name: WISDOM
WIS.description: Intuition and perception, affects magical resistance and willpower.

CHA.name: CHARISMA
CHA.description: Social influence, affects dialogue, prices, and persuasion.

WIL.name: WILLPOWER
WIL.description: Mental fortitude, resistance to influence and fear.

INS.name: INSIGHT
INS.description: Understanding situations, detecting lies, and sensing motives.

Max Action Points.name: MAX_AP
Max Action Points.description: Your maximum action points for use in combat.

AP Regeneration.name: AP_REGENERATION
AP Regeneration.description: The amount of action points you recover at the start of your turn.

Melee Attack.name: MELEE_ATTACK
Melee Attack.description: Your ability to hit opponents in melee combat.

Ranged Attack.name: RANGED_ATTACK
Ranged Attack.description: Your ability to hit opponents with ranged weapons.

Magic Attack.name: MAGIC_ATTACK
Magic Attack.description: Your ability to hit opponents with magical attacks.

Defense.name: DEFENSE
Defense.description: Your ability to avoid physical damage.

Magic Defense.name: MAGIC_DEFENSE
Magic Defense.description: Your ability to resist magical effects.

Damage Reduction.name: DAMAGE_REDUCTION
Damage Reduction.description: Reduces incoming physical damage by a flat amount.

Initiative.name: INITIATIVE
Initiative.description: Determines your turn order in combat.

Carry Capacity.name: CARRY_CAPACITY
Carry Capacity.description: The maximum weight you can carry.

Movement.name: MOVEMENT
Movement.description: How far you can move in combat.

Health Points.name: HEALTH
Health Points.description: Your current hit points. When this reaches zero, you are incapacitated.

Resolve.name: RESOLVE
Resolve.description: Your current social/mental composure. Reduced by stress or social defeats.

Mana Points.name: MANA
Mana Points.description: Your current magical energy. Required for casting spells.

Stamina.name: STAMINA
Stamina.description: Your current physical energy. Required for special physical actions.

0c835d05-eaa2-40b0-a691-58835d4505ba.name: Ash-Treated Clothing
0c835d05-eaa2-40b0-a691-58835d4505ba.description: Simple, durable clothing treated with sacred ashes for resilience and a faint connection to ancestral spirits. Common among the Ashen Covenant.

7fd48bb1-7eb3-4c94-9f14-1f0bf25ec1fc.name: Covenant Pendant
7fd48bb1-7eb3-4c94-9f14-1f0bf25ec1fc.description: A small, carved bone pendant bearing the symbol of the Ashen Covenant. It's said to ward off minor malevolent spirits.

c96f4b25-5bd4-41b1-a5c8-0bb51a0897ac.name: Fire Striker
c96f4b25-5bd4-41b1-a5c8-0bb51a0897ac.description: A reliable flint and steel for starting fires. Essential for survival and Covenant rituals.

187cc6d0-9fa3-4100-9842-c1a1142e6730.name: Ritual Dagger
187cc6d0-9fa3-4100-9842-c1a1142e6730.description: A ceremonial dagger, sharp and well-balanced, used by the Ashen Covenant in their rites. It feels strangely warm to the touch.

732fba3d-6b56-4c99-9ab3-9d75eb92bfdc.name: Small Pouch of Ancestral Ash
732fba3d-6b56-4c99-9ab3-9d75eb92bfdc.description: A leather pouch containing a mixture of sacred ashes from revered ancestors of the Ashen Covenant. Used in rituals and for guidance.

213be460-5288-4da2-8dc2-e80420bbba8c.name: Wooden Shield
213be460-5288-4da2-8dc2-e80420bbba8c.description: A simple shield made of wood, providing basic protection.
